data.title: Yekaterinburg Weather in July: Temperature, Rainfall, & More
data.meta_description: Check accurate weather in July in Yekaterinburg. Expect Yekaterinburg July temperature around 24°C (75°F). Read clothing tips & recommended activities.
data.text:
Yekaterinburg weather in July (Sverdlovsk Region, Russia)

Is July a good time to explore Yekaterinburg weather-wise? Check out our in-depth weather guide for this month.

Temperatures

You’ll find the weather in Yekaterinburg during July to be perfect, with high temperatures and moderate rainfall. July is known for being in the summer season. Anticipate daytime temperatures around 24°C, while night temperatures can drop to 13°C. On average, it sees the highest temps of the year.

Precipitation

Yekaterinburg in July usually receives moderate rainfall, averaging around 90 mm for the month. Prepare for the wettest month with an umbrella to protect yourself from frequent rain. Typically around 15 days days of rainfall are expected.

Average sunshine

With around 269 hours of sunshine, the days are mostly sunny. It gives a pleasant and vibrant feel to the area.

If you're inclined towards comfortable temperatures and drier conditions, July is a prime time to visit Yekaterinburg. June, July and August typically offer the best circumstances. While January, February, March, April, October, November and December tend to showcase less optimal conditions.

For an in-depth look at the yearly conditions, visit our specialized Yekaterinburg climate page with graphs.

Yekaterinburg, monthly averages in July

Min Temperature 13°C

Max Temperature 24°C

Chance of Rain 51%

Precipitation 90 mm

Rainy days 15 days

Humidity 68% *

Windspeed 11 km/h *

Sunshine 269 hours *

Percentage Sunshine *

* Data from: Jekaterinburg, Russia (4 KM, 2 Miles).

Where to go in Russia in July

Find out more about the weather in Russia and which places have the best travel conditions in this month.

Map not visible? Whoops sorry! Please refresh the page.

Legend perfect weather pleasant tolerable unpleasant poor

Perfect weather is subjective. On this map perfect weather has been defined with temperatures between 20°C and 29°C and not too much precipitation (less than 90 mm a month).

So, what should you wear in this month?

For visitors traveling to Yekaterinburg, we recommend wearing layers. So maybe a skirt, t-shirt, shorts for during the day and jeans and a warm jacket for some days and evenings. Bring a rain jacket in case it rains during your stay. Plan on layering your clothes.

What To Do

We rated the following activities from 1 (least suitable) to 10 (best) to do.

Swimming 9/10

Cycling 9/10

Walking 9/10

Barbeque 8/10

Camping 8/10

Outdoor sports 9/10

Interested in more climate information?

This site provides you with all the information you need about the climate in Yekaterinburg.

Our site offers climate and forecast data for every country in the world. Are you going to Russia? On this website you can find historical weather averages for many cities in Russia.
